th

, And have allowed unto him for his Diett and entretayment the
s
o
me of fortie Shilling
by the daie during the time of his abode there
These are to will and c
o

r

ninge or shall come into the Receipt of o
r
said Exchequer to deliver and
paie or cause to be delivered and paied to the said Thomas Bodley or his
assignes the said some of fortie shilling
by the daie to begin from the xxij
th
of September last and to be continued unto him untill the
[.]
daie of
his retourne againe unto o
r

him before hande for his better furnishinge in this his Journey the s
o
me
of one hundered pounde the said s
o
me to be afterwards defalked out of
his said entertaynment, And o
r
further will and pleasure is that out of
o
r

s
o
mes of money as he shall signifie unto you by his bill signed w
th
